title: Longest Inc Subseq
description: In computer science, the Longest Increasing Subsequence (LIS) problem is to find the length of the longest subsequence of a given sequence such that all elements of the subsequence are sorted in increasing order. This subsequence is not necessarily contiguous, or unique.

meta.title: Longest Increasing Subsequence
meta.description: Explore the Longest Increasing Subsequence problem, its requirements, and examples of its usage in computer science.
meta.keywords: python playground, lis, longest increasing subsequence, python, algorithm, programming, computer science

i18n.title: 最长递增子序列
i18n.description: 在计算机科学中，最长递增子序列（Longest Increasing Subsequence，LIS）问题是要找出给定序列中最长子序列的长度，使得该子序列的所有元素按升序排序。这个子序列不一定是连续的，也不一定是唯一的。

meta.description: 探索最长递增子序列问题、其要求以及在计算机科学中的使用示例。
